post.description: The "Create White-label Integration Provider" API allows adding a new payment provider integration to the system which is built on top of Authorize.net or NMI. Use this endpoint to create a integration provider with the specified details. Ensure that the required information is provided in the request payload. This endpoint can be only invoked using marketplace-app token

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access Token

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: API Version

get.description: The "List White-label Integration Providers" API allows to retrieve a paginated list of integration providers. Customize your results by filtering whitelabel integration providers(which are built directly on top of Authorize.net or NMI) based on name or paginate through the list using the provided query parameters. This endpoint provides a straightforward way to explore and retrieve integration provider information.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access Token

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: altId
parameters.description: location Id / company Id based on altType

parameters.name: altType
parameters.description: Alt Type

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be included in a single page of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting index of the page, indicating the position from which the results should be retrieved.

get.description: The "List Orders" API allows to retrieve a paginated list of orders. Customize your results by filtering orders based on name, alt type, order status, payment mode, date range, type of source, contact, funnel products or paginate through the list using the provided query parameters. This endpoint provides a straightforward way to explore and retrieve order information.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access Token

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: LocationId is the id of the sub-account.

parameters.name: altId
parameters.description: AltId is the unique identifier e.g: location id.

parameters.name: altType
parameters.description: AltType is the type of identifier.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Order status.

parameters.name: paymentMode
parameters.description: Mode of payment.

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Starting interval of orders.

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: Closing interval of orders.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name of the order for searching.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: Contact id for filtering of orders.

parameters.name: funnelProductIds
parameters.description: Funnel product ids separated by comma.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be included in a single page of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting index of the page, indicating the position from which the results should be retrieved.

get.description: The "Get Order by ID" API allows to retrieve information for a specific order using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to fetch details for a single order based on the provided order ID.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access Token

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: orderId
parameters.description: ID of the order that needs to be returned

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: LocationId is the id of the sub-account.

parameters.name: altId
parameters.description: AltId is the unique identifier e.g: location id.

parameters.name: altType
parameters.description: AltType is the type of identifier.

get.description: The "List Transactions" API allows to retrieve a paginated list of transactions. Customize your results by filtering transactions based on name, alt type, transaction status, payment mode, date range, type of source, contact, subscription id, entity id or paginate through the list using the provided query parameters. This endpoint provides a straightforward way to explore and retrieve transaction information.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access Token

parameters.name: Version
parameters.description: API Version

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: LocationId is the id of the sub-account.

parameters.name: altId
parameters.description: AltId is the unique identifier e.g: location id.

parameters.name: altType
parameters.description: AltType is the type of identifier.

parameters.name: paymentMode
parameters.description: Mode of payment.

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Starting interval of transactions.

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: Closing interval of transactions.

parameters.name: entitySourceType
parameters.description: Source of the transactions.

parameters.name: entitySourceSubType
parameters.description: Source sub-type of the transactions.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: The name of the transaction for searching.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription id for filtering of transactions.

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: Entity id for filtering of transactions.

parameters.name: contactId
parameters.description: Contact id for filtering of transactions.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to be included in a single page of results

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The starting index of the page, indicating the position from which the results should be retrieved.

get.description: The "List Subscriptions" API allows to retrieve a paginated list of subscriptions. Customize your results by filtering subscriptions based on name, alt type, subscription status, payment mode, date range, type of source, contact, subscription id, entity id, contact or paginate through the list using the provided query parameters. This endpoint provides a straightforward way to explore and retrieve subscription information.

parameters.name: altId

parameters.description: AltType is the type of identifier.

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: Entity id for filtering of subscriptions.

parameters.name: paymentMode
parameters.description: Mode of payment.

parameters.name: startAt
parameters.description: Starting interval of subscriptions.

parameters.name: endAt
parameters.description: Closing interval of subscriptions.

parameters.description: Source of the subscriptions.

parameters.name: search

parameters.description: Contact ID for the subscription

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Subscription id for filtering of subscriptions.

parameters.description: The starting index of the page, indicating the position from which the results should be retrieved.

get.description: The "Get Subscription by ID" API allows to retrieve information for a specific subscription using its unique identifier. Use this endpoint to fetch details for a single subscription based on the provided subscription ID.

bearer.name: Authorization
bearer.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Location

Location-Access.name: Authorization
Location-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Location

Agency-Access.name: Authorization
Agency-Access.description: Use the Access Token generated with user type as Company

message.example: Invalid token: access token is invalid

altId.description: location Id / company Id based on altType

uniqueName.description: A unique name given to the integration provider, uniqueName must start and end with a character. Only lowercase characters and hyphens (-) are supported

title.description: The title or name of the integration provider.

provider.description: The type of payment provider associated with the integration provider.

description.description: A brief description providing additional information about the integration provider.

imageUrl.description: The URL to an image representing the integration provider. The imageUrl should start with "https://" and ensure that this URL is publicly accessible.

_id.description: The unique identifier of the integration provider.

altId.description: The altId / locationId of the integration provider.

altType.description: The altType of the integration provider.

title.description: The title or name of the integration provider.

route.description: The route name associated with the integration provider.

provider.description: The payment provider associated with the integration provider.

description.description: A brief description providing additional information about the integration provider.

imageUrl.description: The URL to an image representing the integration provider.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the integration provider was created.

updatedAt.description: The timestamp when the integration provider was last updated.

A unique identifier for the variant.

options.description: An array of options for the variant.

id.description: The unique identifier for the media.

title.description: The title of the media file.

url.description: The URL where the media file is stored.

type.description: The type of the media file (e.g., image, video will be supporting soon).

isFeatured.description: Indicates whether the media is featured.

priceIds.description: Mongo ObjectIds of the prices for which the media is assigned

_id.description: The unique identifier for the product.

description.example: This is a really awesome product

variants.description: An array of variants for the product.

medias.description: An array of medias for the product.

locationId.description: The unique identifier for the location.

productType.description: The type of the product (e.g., PHYSICAL).

availableInStore.description: Indicates whether the product is available in-store.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user who created the product.

createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the product.

updatedAt.description: The last update timestamp of the product.

statementDescriptor.description: The statement descriptor for the product.

image.description: The URL for the product image.

collectionIds.description: An array of category Ids for the product

isTaxesEnabled.description: Is automatic attachment of taxes enabled for the product

taxes.description: An array of ids of Taxes attached to the Product. If the expand query includes tax, the taxes will be of type `ProductTaxDto`. Please refer to the `ProductTaxDto` for additional details.

_id.description: The unique identifier for the membership offer.

interval.description: The interval at which the recurring event occurs.

intervalCount.description: The number of intervals between each occurrence of the event.

_id.description: The unique identifier for the price.

membershipOffers.description: An array of membership offers associated with the price.

variantOptionIds.description: An array of variant option IDs associated with the price.

product.description: The unique identifier for the associated product.

userId.description: The unique identifier for the user.

type.description: The type of the price (e.g., one_time).

currency.description: The currency code for the price.

recurring.description: The recurring details of the price (if type is recurring).

createdAt.description: The creation timestamp of the price.

updatedAt.description: The last update timestamp of the price.

compareAtPrice.description: The compare-at price for comparison purposes.

trackInventory.description: Indicates whether inventory tracking is enabled.

allowOutOfStockPurchases.description: Continue selling when out of stock

qty.description: The no of quantity of the current fulfilled item
